ResourceHeader.ResourceName: GEOS-1 Geographic Position and Auxiliary Data Level-2 (PostScripts)
ResourceHeader.Description:
This  dataset contains plots of GEOS-1 ephemeris data:

    Geographic Position
    Sat-E-Sun
    Spin Axis Tilt
    Spin Axis in VHD
    Dipole Axis in VHD
    Sun Dir. in VHD
    Quality
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement:
Users of these data are encouraged to acknowledge ESA/ESTEC (European Space Agency / European Space Research and Technology Center), DSRI (Danish Space Research Institute), CNES (Centre National d'Etudes Spatiales) for their support to the SCM GEOS team, NASA/GSFC (National Aeronautics and Space Administration / Goddard Space Flight Center) and CNR (Consiglio Nazionale delle Ricerche) for their support to the MAG GEOS team, and the CDPP (Centre des Données de la Physique des Plasmas) for the distribution of the GEOS data, in all publications.

If PI/coI are not part of the publication list, then we suggest to add Specifically, we acknowledge Roger Gendrin and Patrick Robert for use of SCM data from the GEOS mission.

AccessURL.Name: REGARDS
AccessURL.Description: Access via CNES Data Archive for CDPP

Parameter.Name: Distance of the Spacecraft to the centre of the Earth
Parameter.Description: Distance of the Spacecraft to the centre of the Earth

Parameter.Name: Sun S/C angle
Parameter.Description: Angle between the two lines Earth-centre to satellite and Sun to Earth-centre (i.e eclipse at zero angle)

Parameter.Name: S/C spin axis right ascension
Parameter.Description: Right ascension of the spin axis tilt in spacecraft coordinates.

Parameter.Name: S/C spin axis  declination
Parameter.Description: Declination of the spin axis tilt in spacecraft coordinates.

Parameter.Name: S/C spin axis in VDH
Parameter.Description: S/C spin axis components in VDH system

Parameter.Name: Magnetic dipole axis in VDH system
Parameter.Description: Components of the magnetic dipole axis in VDH system

Parameter.Name: Sun axis in VDH system
Parameter.Description: Components of the Sun axis in VDH system
